verses.roman:
manur vai dharma-sāvarṇir
ekādaśama ātmavān
anāgatās tat-sutāś ca
satyadharmādayo daśa

synonyms: manuḥ—the Manu; vai—indeed; dharma-sāvarṇiḥ—Dharmasāvarṇi; ekādaśamaḥ—eleventh; ātmavān—the controller of the senses; anāgatāḥ—will come in the future; tat—his; sutāḥ—sons; ca—and; satyadharma-ādayaḥ—Satyadharma and others; daśa—ten.
translation: In the eleventh manvantara, the Manu will be Dharma-sāvarṇi, who will be extremely learned in spiritual knowledge. From him there will come ten sons, headed by Satyadharma.
